Articles.Content:
How do you post and share a spacecraft?

Post in the comments below:

(I recommend using mediafire to upload your crafts)

You sign up for mediafire

open your documents

go to the ksp folder

go to saves

open the save where your desired craft is

open the VAB or SPH folder (depends whether is the craft a plane or a rocket)

and you should see your craft file

drag the craft file to mediafire (upload)

right click and select "copy link"

paste here
Thank you! I have already posted two craft files Now I can be known better on KSP Forum
But I got one problem. They want pictures but for some reason I can not copy and paste Fraps pictures
Screenshots. Upload them to tinypic and copy paste the link meant for forum into your post.
Now I know. I found there website I think. Is it this?

But I got one problem. They want pictures but for some reason I can not copy and paste Fraps pictures

Use Imgur, it is a great picture sharing site and lets you setup an album and post several pictures without any extra space in the forum post required.

Like this.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Craft files are just text files so you could also use pastebin.
